title: 🔥3 bed/2 bath available right away!Your cat and dog is welcomed!
posting_body: Located in Chicago's Little Village/Pilsen neighborhood.
The apartment features an open floor plan, new kitchen and bathroom, new stainless steel appliances, big bedrooms, and beautiful new hardwood floors.
A short walk from the California Pink Line stop and the 21 Cermak bus.

Two blocks walk to Sip 22 Coffee Lounge, Maria Saucedo Academy, Farragut Academy, Little Village Branch Public Library; short walk to Pete's Fresh Market, Mt. Sinai, and Saint Anthony Hospitals and a view of Douglas Park.
Short L ride to Rush/UIC Medical District and the University of Illinois at Chicago.
The building is professionally managed and secure.
- Water included in rent, other utilities are the responsibility of the tenant.
- Pet fee waived for a first pet under 35 pounds,no aggressive breeds please.
Tenants' monthly income, rental history, and credit scores are used to review your application.
Credit scores of 600+ are ideal but we are willing to work with certain situations.
Qualified tenants must have no history of evictions.
For more information or to schedule a showing, please contact our leasing agent Lucy via text message at 773 877 9647 or email
